## Installation (pipx)

### Install pipx

```bash
python3 -m pip install pipx
```

```bash
python3 -m pipx ensurepath
```

### Install tor-refresh

```bash
pipx install tor-refresh
```

```bash
tor_refresh <?port> <?control_port>
```

## Installation (git)

### Install tor-refresh

```bash
git clone https://github.com/Fraccs/tor-refresh.git
```

```bash
python3 src/tor_refresh.py <?port> <?control_port>
```
